# KBO2020

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of KBO2020 is to provide KBO Hitters and Pitchers' stats.

## Installation

You can install the released version of KBO2020 from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("KBO2020")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MrKevinNa/KBO2020")
```

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:
